title: Containers & Runtimes
notes: On macOS we also install Colima as the VM layer. Engine is a one-of.

tools.name: colima
tools.rationale: Lightweight VM for Docker/Podman on macOS; provides container runtime layer.

tools.name: compose
tools.rationale: Defines and runs multi-container applications declaratively.

tools.name: nomad
tools.rationale: HashiCorp scheduler for container and non-container workloads.

tools.name: trivy
tools.rationale: Security scanner for container images and filesystem vulnerabilities.

tools.name: buildah
tools.rationale: OCI-compliant tool to build container images without Docker daemon.

tools.name: skopeo
tools.rationale: Utility for copying, inspecting, and signing container images.

tools.name: dive
tools.rationale: Image analyzer for understanding Docker image layers.

tools.name: docker-slim
tools.rationale: Optimizer that reduces image size and attack surface.

tools.name: syft
tools.rationale: Generates SBOMs (Software Bill of Materials) from container images.

tools.name: grype
tools.rationale: Vulnerability scanner for container images using SBOMs.
